reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's cherry print, with one noting its rockabilly 50s pinup vibe, and appreciate its beautiful quality, softness, and comfort. The color receives positive feedback, with customers particularly praising the perfect shade of red for the cherries. The fit and sleeve length receive mixed reviews - while some find it a good length, others say it runs small, and while many like the cropped top style

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So adorable! Glad I sized up
items.body: This cardigan is absolutely beautiful- the embroidery is perfect, the knit is soft and stretchy, and the buttons are just so cute in red. Iâ€™m very happy I got the large rather than the medium I normally would choose for a fitted style. Itâ€™s very cropped and Iâ€™m short. The large hits right at my waist- if you have a larger chest you donâ€™t want this to be too small- it would have been difficult to button up and keep its shape if Iâ€™d gone with the smaller size. Just took it out of the package and am wearing it immediately so I canâ€™t attest to how it washes, but Iâ€™ll be taking great care when I do because I love it so much!! Read more
items.author: Molly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely adorable sweater!
items.body: This sweater was the 4th piece I have purchased from this store, and it did not disappoint! First, the cut and the cherries are just adorable, and so fun to add to a work outfit or some skinny jeans. The fit is really flattering-itâ€™s not a piece meant to be worn oversized, so it is about waist length and fitted, like vintage cardigans from the 50â€™s and 40â€™s. I love the fabric, itâ€™s light enough for a person who is always hot, like me, yet cozy enough for cooler temps or those frigid offices! The best part is how soft it is! Almost like an angora blendâ€¦not itchy at all. The only part I donâ€™t love is that the cherries are not embroidered, they are sewn on patchesâ€¦they still look cute though, and are perfectly acceptable for the price of the sweater. The extra soft material makes up for that, too-definitely adds a luxe look and feel. I love to pair my sweater with a blouse that I also purchased from this shop-the short sleeve button up black top with the small white dotsâ€¦I get so many compliments when I wear them! While I have not run this through the washer/dryer, Iâ€™m not worried about it holding up or fading. I have not noticed any pulls or pilling on it either. Definitely a winner, and I would recommend this great sweater to anyone considering it! Read more
items.author: Shark_Kisses ðŸ¦ˆ

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars not as pictured
items.body: cute but way to short in length came above my waist. returned it. Read more
items.author: Pam Taylor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft & cozy, but order a larger size (halter style)
items.body: Soft; great quality; halter style sweater Order a larger size depending on the style (or even two sizes bigger). I highly recommend I wish they would make it in a non-halter style cardigan Read more
items.author: Linz

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Buttons fell off with 1 wash. Very soft, stretchy. Sleeves not true 3/4 length.
items.body: Update 3 stars - poorly sewn buttons Washed according to care instructions and even used a garment bag, and three of the buttons are now completely falling off. Pretty sweater, but I hate sewing and I shouldn't have to repair a garment after just one wash. Sending it back... Dang it, so cute but just not high quality. Original Review 4 stars Surprisingly soft, stretchy and pretty. Button threads feel a bit loose, be gentle w them. One is loose enough that if I pull it'll come all the way off. It fit pretty well (I am 5'5" 200lb curvy) but I might be returning because of how high the crop is (I may have a slightly longer torso than average though?); seems it would be a bit high even with high-waist pants or skirts. Also I think i'll want to get something with more arm coverage (personal preference). These sleeves are not quite a full 3/4 length. Overall seems a decent value for the price, and exceedingly soft. Would be lovely on the right lady who knows how to wear crop tops! Read more
items.author: Leah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Much shorter than it appears!
items.body: As you can see in the photos the sweater I received (a size large) is quite short in comparison to the width. The advertised length for size large is 16.1". The sweater I received has a back length of 15.5". The advertised sleeve length for the large is 15.7". The sweater I received has a sleeve length of 14.5". The tag on the sweater indicates it is size large. I am 5'7" tall and weigh 123 lb. Chest circumference 37". I usually wear a size 8 or Medium on the top but sized up due to reviews. The large size sweater comes just barely below my natural waistline and the sleeves come 1 1/2" below the elbow. The circumference is ok, but length is too short for anything but a bolero style jacket/sweater or a crop top look. I have a feeling that the larger sizes do not get any longer in comparison to the width, so please consider this if ordering. This design is advertised as 3/4 length sleeve, but it is actually about 1/2 length sleeve. On the positive side the material is very soft. It should be since it is 55% viscose, 40% polyamide, and 5% elastane. Nothing natural here. Washing instructions just say wash in 30 degree C. My guess is that it would melt in any heat. Update on sweater review: The pictures while wearing the sweater emphasize the shorter length of the body and sleeves of the sweater. Although this does not distract from the "cuteness" of the sweater, just be aware of this shorter length. A large busted person will have the sweater sit even higher on the torso as a result of chest circumference. The last photo shows how the sweater can look unbuttoned and with a black camisole underneath. Read more
items.author: CJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars sooo soft and cute
items.body: fits perfectly! warm, SOFT, beautiful quality. cherries are embroidered which is adorable. sweater is a deep black colour with vivid red cherries that pop. seems a good value for the money. I'm 5'3, 155 lbs with a full bust (34G) and the large fits me without tugging or riding up when buttoned. I'm SO happy with how soft the fabric is (even before washed!) bc I have sensitive skin. Read more
items.author: deb

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shorter than expected, but still cute
items.body: Donâ€™t expect to pair this as a top with most skirts. Even for my high waisted skirts, it did not meet the waist. Iâ€™m 5â€™5â€, too, so not exactly willowy. But it is adorable over a slip dress. The fabric and embroidery are quality, the color is adorable, so Iâ€™m keeping it. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink, Cream White, Mint, Apricot, Ivory White, Black, Light Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
